articles.author: Andrea Blanco
articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow trial – live: Ski crash witness says star 'bolted' as Apple, Moses and Brad Falchuk to testify - The Independent
articles.description: Goop founder faces civil lawsuit regarding 2016 skiing accident involving retired optometrist Terry Sanderson at Deer Valley resort
articles.content:
Who is plaintiff Terry Sanderson?
A 76-year-old retired optometrist is suing actor-turned-lifestyle influencer Gwyneth Paltrow after he claims she struck him in a hit-and-run ski crash seven years a… [+1101 chars]
